chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> st_compat_check s sigma = true

Premises:
st_compat_check = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => st_compat_check_0 pre_ad_empty sigma s : state -> signature -> bool
signature = Map nat : Set
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (s s' : state), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma -> st_compatible s s'
st_compat_check_0_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa -> st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true
st_compat_check_0_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma end : preDTA -> signature -> bool
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
st_compat_check_0 = fix st_compat_check_0 (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ a p => match pl_compat_check p with | Some n => match MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) with | Some m => n =? m | None => false end | None => false end | @M2 _ x y => st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x && st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_I pa) sigma y end : pre_ad -> signature -> state -> bool
dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta p _ => predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature -> bool
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem_2 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
semantic_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p l n = true
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.set_rec : forall P : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t -> Type, (forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s s' = true -> P s -> P s') -> (forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = false -> P s -> P (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.add x s)) -> P FSetPositive.PositiveSet.empty -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, P s
borne_0 : forall (s : state) (p : prec_list), prec_in_state s p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 s
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.subset_mem_2 : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s s' = true -> forall a : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem a s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem a s' = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.subset_antisym : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s s' = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s' s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s s' = true
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
st_reconnait : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait d s t -> Prop
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.Dec.F.mem_iff : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s < -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.mem_3 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), ~ FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = false
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.inter_add_1 : forall (s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s' = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.inter (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.add x s) s') (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.add x (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.inter s s')) = true
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal_2 : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal s s' = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s s'
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset_2 : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.subset s s' = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Subset s s'

```coq
intros s sigma H.
apply st_compat_check_0_correct with pa:=pre_ad_empty; auto.
Qed.
